contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{Context|date=October 2009}} '''Zero-information networks''' are methods for allowing networked communication between individuals in such a way as to prevent networked and [[social network analysis]] that could otherwise be used in order to glean important information concerning the relationships between the individuals that form that network. The [[Tor (anonymity network)|Tor]] network is one example of this. ==External links== *http://tor.freehaven.net/cvs/doc/design-paper/tor-design.html [[Category:Computer networking]] {{Internet-stub}}
